summary: Implements a responsive single-page portfolio layout with section navigation, themed styling via Tailwind CSS variables, a projects section driven by structured data with reusable cards, and a client-side validated contact form with success/error UI. However, SEO/sharing metadata and favicon references are not evidenced, and the presence of generated static image files in the required public assets path is not shown in the diff summary. Several unrequested additions (empty backend actor, Internet Identity/actor hooks, and footer attribution link) are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a site-wide background color matching the user-provided background color, applied consistently across all sections and components.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a background/theme being set via CSS variables (e.g., --background) and applied (bg-background), but there is no evidence it matches a specific user-provided background color value.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (page title, description, favicon, Open Graph defaults) using English user-facing text.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to HTML head, title/meta tags, favicon links, or Open Graph metadata are shown in the diff summary. The only entrypoint shown is main.tsx, which does not set metadata.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include minimal custom static imagery for the portfolio (hero/brand visuals) and render them from frontend static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference image paths under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show the actual generated image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (those assets may be in omitted files, but evidence is not present here).

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty Internet Computer backend actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not require backend implementation for this portfolio; it only noted constraints if backend work becomes necessary later.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity and actor/react-query scaffolding (authentication and actor creation hooks).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states authentication is not required for this portfolio; these hooks are not needed to satisfy the requested frontend portfolio features.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Sample project data includes payments-related technology ('Stripe') in the tech stack.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly disallow payments/checkout flows; while this is only sample data, it introduces payments-focused content not aligned with the stated non-goals.
